name: Verified QR code
description: QR code used to scan attendance in and out for visitors and contractors entering or exiting the store.
constraints: Visitors and contractors must scan in attendance using the Verified QR code on arrival.
Visitors and contractors must scan out attendance using the Verified QR code on exit.
bestPractice: Inform the management team when visitors and contractors arrive or exit the store.
Ensure visitors and contractors scan in attendance using the Verified QR code on arrival.
Ensure visitors and contractors scan out attendance using the Verified QR code on exit.
